title: Client crashes
body: In champselect sometimes the client crashes and im kicked from the lobby. Im getting pretty severe punishments for this now and I dont know how to stop it. like -10 lp and 15 minute queue timers. Id really like for this to not happen. especially before these punishments get alot worse!

replies.body:
Crashes in champ select are ordinarily related to your computer dropping its connection to the matchmaking servers. If you check out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), you'll find a consolidated list of steps that should be able to resolve this.

Let me know if this helped!
